user.title: Wattpilot Setup
user.description: Set up your Fronius Wattpilot EV charger. You will need the charger's IP address (for local connection) or serial number (for cloud connection) and the connection password.

connection.title: Connection Type
connection.description: Select how to connect to your charger.

data_description.connection: Local connection uses the charger's IP address. Cloud connection uses the serial number.

local.title: Local Connection
local.description: Connect directly to your Wattpilot charger on your local network. This provides faster response times and works without internet.

data_description.friendly_name: A friendly name for your charger (e.g., 'Garage Charger').
data_description.ip_address: The local IP address of your Wattpilot (find it in your router or the Wattpilot app under Settings > WiFi).
data_description.password: The local API password (find it in the Wattpilot app under Settings > WiFi > Show Password or on the charger's sticker).
data_description.timeout: Timeout in seconds for connection and initialization (default: 30).

cloud.title: Cloud Connection
cloud.description: Connect to your Wattpilot charger via the Fronius/go-e cloud. Requires internet access but works from anywhere.

data_description.friendly_name: A friendly name for your charger (e.g., 'Garage Charger').
data_description.serial: The serial number of your Wattpilot (found on the charger's label or in the app under Settings > Info).
data_description.password: The cloud connection password (find it in the Wattpilot app under Settings > Cloud or on the charger's sticker).
data_description.timeout: Timeout in seconds for connection and initialization (default: 30).

local.title: Local Connection Options
local.description: Update the connection settings for your locally connected Wattpilot charger.

data_description.friendly_name: A friendly name for your charger (e.g., 'Garage Charger').
data_description.ip_address: The local IP address of your Wattpilot (find it in your router or the Wattpilot app).
data_description.password: The local API password (leave empty to keep current password).
data_description.timeout: Timeout in seconds for connection and initialization (default: 30).

cloud.title: Cloud Connection Options
cloud.description: Update cloud connection settings for your Wattpilot charger.

data_description.friendly_name: A friendly name for your charger (for display only).
data_description.serial: The serial number of your Wattpilot charger.
data_description.password: The cloud connection password for your charger.
data_description.timeout: Timeout in seconds for connection and initialization.

set_next_trip.name: Set next trip
set_next_trip.description: Set the time for the next trip used by next trip charging mode.

trigger_time.name: Next trip time
trigger_time.description: The time when the next trip is planned.

set_goe_cloud.name: Set go-e cloud
set_goe_cloud.description: Enable or disable the go-e cloud access for the charger.

cloud_api.name: Cloud API
cloud_api.description: Turn go-e cloud API access on or off.

set_debug_properties.name: Set debug properties
set_debug_properties.description: Enable or disable logging of charger property changes as warnings in logs.

debug_properties.name: Debug properties
debug_properties.description: Set to true to debug all properties, false to debug none, or provide a list of specific properties to debug.

disconnect_charger.name: Disconnect charger
disconnect_charger.description: Disconnect an established charger connection. Entities will become unavailable.
